trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Nevada City
There were no other sightings in Nevada City on or around November 1st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsHeading back to work from lunch I noticed people pointing at the sky so I looked to see what the fuss was n I saw this orb looking object next to the sun I thought weather bloons n went on my way an hour or so later I spotted it near the sun an then I noticed it spin in a way an off this orb looking object went I was stuned as threw out the day I heard about it an blew it off untill I saw it myself
Summary: hovedrd with the sun the spun an took off
